member.name: IWICColorTransform.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes an with a and transforms it from one to another.
member.param: The bitmap source used to initialize the color transform.

param.name: pixelFmtDest
param.para: The GUID of the desired pixel format.
This parameter is limited to a subset of the native WIC pixel formats, see Remarks for a list.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorTransform
member.summary: Exposes methods that transforms an from one color context to another.
